Abilities: Str 23, Dex 10, Con 17, Int 10, Wis 11, Cha 11
Feats: Alertness, Cleave, Flyby Attack, Power Attack

Descripci\u00f3n: These sphinxes are always male. Neither good nor evil, they lack the intelligence of the androsphinx.

Combate: Criosphinxes attack with their claws, as do their kin, but they can also butt with their horns. They don’t cast spells and employ only the most simple battle tactics.Rake (Ex): Attack bonus +15 melee, damage 1d6+3.SEE WIKIPEDIA ENTRY: Sphinx
